message.content:
In /Users/shanesaravia/Development/boxing-rounds, find:
1. Any vitest config or vite config that sets up the test environment (look for vitest.config.ts, vite.config.ts, or similar)
2. The CombinationPrompt component (src/components/CombinationPrompt.tsx or similar)
3. Any test setup files (setupTests.ts, vitest-setup.ts, etc.)

Read and return the full contents of each file found.

content.text: I'll search for these files in the boxing-rounds directory.
Now let me read the files that were found:
